titleInfo.title: An Overview of Indigenous Models of Conservation

originInfo.publisher: National Round Table on the Environment and the Economy

mods.abstract: This report presents the NRTEE with an overview of how indigenous people have approached, and continue to approach the protection and preservation of land and resources within broader ecosystem environments.
